extends Object
implements Observer, Cloneable

      Returns the height of the maze, as specified by the current layout.

      Returns the current layout of the maze, which is a 2D-matrix of MazeEntities.

      Returns the width of the maze, as specified by the current layout.
      void removeEntity(MazeEntity ent)
      Removes an entity from this maze, and removes this maze from the entity's list of observers

      Alters the layout by changing the block in the specified location.
      void setEntities(List<MazeEntity> entities)
      Removes existing entities from this maze, removes this maze from each of those entities' list of observers and adds the given entities to this maze.

        public void addEntity(MazeEntity ent)

      • setEntities

        public void setEntities(List<MazeEntity> entities)
        Removes existing entities from this maze, removes this maze from each of those entities' list of observers and adds the given entities to this maze.
        Parameters:
        entities - List of MazeEntities to set.
